com.communote.server.core.image.caching

Class ImageDiskCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.image.caching.ImageDiskCache

  • public class ImageDiskCache
extends Object
    Helper to cache images on disk.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultImage

        public File getDefaultImage(String typeName,
                            String imageProviderId,
                            ImageSize imageSize)
        Get the stored default image.
        Parameters:
        typeName - the name of the image type
        imageProviderId - the ID of the provider which loaded the image
        imageSize - the size of the default image
        Returns:
        the file pointing to the stored default image or null if the file does not exist

      • getScaledImage

        public File getScaledImage(String typeName,
                           String imageProviderId,
                           String imageIdentifier,
                           ImageSize imageSize)
        Get the stored scaled image
        Parameters:
        typeName - the name of the image type
        imageProviderId - the ID of the provider which loaded the unscaled image
        imageIdentifier - The identifier of the unscaled image
        imageSize - the size of the scaled image
        Returns:
        the file pointing to the scaled image or null if it does not exist

      • getUnscaledImage

        public File getUnscaledImage(String typeName,
                             String imageProviderId,
                             String imageIdentifier)
        Get the stored unscaled image
        Parameters:
        typeName - the name of the image type
        imageProviderId - the ID of the provider which loaded the unscaled image
        imageIdentifier - The identifier of the unscaled image
        Returns:
        the file pointing to the image or null if it does not exist

      • removeDefaultImages

        public void removeDefaultImages(String typeName,
                                String imageProviderId)
        Remove the stored default images for the given type
        Parameters:
        typeName - the name of the image type
        imageProviderId - the ID of the image provider which loaded the default image

      • removeImages

        public void removeImages(String typeName,
                         String providerId,
                         String imageIdentifier)
        Remove the scaled and unscaled images of the given type that were loaded by the given provider from disk.
        Parameters:
        typeName - the name of the image type.
        providerId - the ID of the provider that loaded the image
        imageIdentifier - identifier of the image to remove. Can be null to remove all images of the provider

      • removeScaledImages

        public void removeScaledImages(String typeName)
        Remove the scaled images (including the default images) of the given type from disk
        Parameters:
        typeName - the name of the image type

      • storeDefaultImage

        public File storeDefaultImage(String typeName,
                              String imageProviderId,
                              Image image,
                              ImageSize imageSize)
                       throws IOException
        Store the provided default image on disk
        Parameters:
        typeName - the name of the image type
        imageProviderId - the ID of the provider which loaded the image
        image - the default image to store
        imageSize - the size of the default image
        Returns:
        the file pointing to the stored image
        Throws:
        IOException - in case storing the image failed

      • storeScaledImage

        public File storeScaledImage(String typeName,
                             String imageProviderId,
                             String imageIdentifier,
                             Image image,
                             ImageSize imageSize)
                      throws IOException
        Store the provided scaled image on disk if it does not yet exist
        Parameters:
        typeName - the name of the image type
        imageProviderId - the ID of the provider which loaded the unscaled image
        imageIdentifier - The identifier of the unscaled image
        image - the scaled image to store
        imageSize - the size of the scaled image
        Returns:
        the file pointing to the stored image
        Throws:
        IOException - in case storing failed

      • storeUnscaledImage

        public File storeUnscaledImage(String typeName,
                               String imageProviderId,
                               String imageIdentifier,
                               Image image)
                        throws IOException
        Store the provided image on disk. If the unscaled image exists it will be removed before storing. Any scaled version will also be removed.
        Parameters:
        typeName - the name of the image type
        imageProviderId - the ID of the provider which loaded the image
        imageIdentifier - The identifier of the image
        image - the unscaled image to store
        Returns:
        the file pointing to the stored image
        Throws:
        IOException - in case storing failed
